FAQSection.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.desc: Everything you need to know for a hassle-free rental

One.title: How can I book a car on rental 365?
One.content: To book a car on rental 365, simply visit our website, choose your destination, select the rental dates and times, and browse the available options. Once you find the car that suits you, click 'Book' and follow the instructions to finalize your reservation.

Two.title: What documents do I need to rent a car?
Two.content: You will need to provide a valid driver's license, identification (such as a passport or ID card), and a credit card in the main driver's name for the security deposit.

Three.title: Is there an age limit to rent a car?
Three.content: Yes, the minimum age to rent a car on rental 365 is 21. However, some vehicle categories may have specific age restrictions. Please check the rental conditions for each car.

Four.title: What payment methods are accepted?
Four.content: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) for online payments. Some rentals may also allow debit card payments. Check the available payment options during the booking process.

Five.title: What should I do in case of a breakdown or accident?
Five.content: In case of a breakdown or accident, contact our 24/7 roadside assistance immediately. Emergency phone numbers are included in your rental contract. Follow the provided instructions and make sure to report any incidents as soon as possible.

Welcome.title: WELCOME TO RENTAL 365 CAR RENTAL AGENCY
Welcome.desc: RENTAL 365 The world’s leading car rental platform.

morrDesc.phrase_1: Rental 365 car rental agency has continuously developed thanks to a rigorous quality policy and constant evolution.
morrDesc.phrase_2: Rental 365's activity is based on short- and long-term vehicle rental for individuals and companies.
morrDesc.phrase_3: Rental 365 has established itself in the Moroccan market through its professionalism, service quality, and excellent value for money.
morrDesc.phrase_4: - Punctuality, rigor, and seriousness are the guiding principles behind Rental 365's growth.
morrDesc.phrase_5: - Punctuality is a key value at Rental 365, meaning the agency strives to be on time for vehicle delivery and pick-up. This guarantees clients that they can rely on the agency to meet their time and planning commitments.
